titles.title: National Forest Foundation Act Amendment Act of 1993
National Forest Foundation Act Amendment Act of 1993
A bill to improve administrative services and support provided to the National Forest Foundation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10581)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Research.
Senate Committee on Agriculture discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. de la Garza asked unanimous consent to take from the Speaker's table and consider.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Research, Conservation, Forestry and General Legislation

bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. National Forest Foundation Act Amendment Act of 1993 - Amends the National Forest Foundation Act to authorize start-up and matching funds to the National Forest Foundation to carry out project expenses. Extends the start-up funding to October 1, 1994, and the matching funding to October 1, 1997.
